about_the_game:
Silent Witness is a strategic, dice-based roguelike that redefines the deck-building genre. Set in a dark and mysterious world, players must harness the power of fate by rolling customizable dice to battle against increasingly challenging enemies. Each decision, roll, and upgrade can mean the difference between survival and defeat.

Features:

  • Innovative Dice Mechanics: Replace traditional card decks with dice that can be upgraded and modified to unlock new abilities and strategies. Build your arsenal of dice to overcome unique challenges.

  • Dynamic Strategy: Adapt to ever-changing circumstances as you manage resources, plan your actions, and roll for success. Every choice you make shapes your journey.

  • Challenging Encounters: Face off against a variety of foes, each with distinct abilities and tactics. Prepare for epic boss fights that will test your wits and luck.

  • Roguelike Progression: No two runs are the same. Explore procedurally generated paths, discover powerful relics, and experiment with different builds to perfect your playstyle.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Dive into a visually striking world, complete with haunting music and rich storytelling that unveils the secrets behind the Silent Witness.

Are you ready to roll the dice and carve your destiny? In Silent Witness, the outcome is in your hands—how far will your choices take you?
